subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matz, who put up stellar numbers in Class AAA, was unprepared for his first big league news conference, but he was ready to become a member of a six-man rotation when he debuts for the Mets on Sunday.
snippet: Matz, who put up stellar numbers in Class AAA, was unprepared for his first big league news conference, but he was ready to become a member of a six-man rotation when he debuts for the Mets on Sunday.
